text: Tumhara bhala hota hai to unko bura maloom hota hai, aur tumpar koi museebat aati hai to yeh khush hotey hain, magar inki koi tadbeer tumhare khilaf kaargar nahin ho sakti basharth yeh ke tum sabr se kaam lo aur Allah se darr kar kaam karte raho. Jo kuch yeh kar rahey hain Allah uspar haawi hai
